member.name: T:StarSimLib.Constants
member.summary: Holds common constants and helper functions.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.BodyCount
member.summary: The amount of bodies that are rendered by default.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.CentralBodyMass
member.summary: The mass of the central body, if it is included.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.FrameRate
member.summary: The frame rate limit for the simulation.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.G
member.summary: The gravitational constant (m^3 kg^-1 s^-2).

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SecondsPerFrame
member.summary: The number of seconds that each frame represents.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SofteningFactor
member.summary: Softens the force between s to avoid infinities.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SofteningFactor2
member.summary: The square of the .

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.SolarMass
member.summary: The mass of the sun (1.98892e30f).

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.TimeStep
member.summary: The default time step for the simulation.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.UniverseScalingFactor
member.summary: Factor by which to multiply the position of s to scale them to the screen for displaying.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Constants.UniverseSize
member.summary: The maximum radius within which s will be placed (1e18f).

member.name: T:StarSimLib.Contexts.SimulatorContext
member.summary: Represents the solar simulation database.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.Contexts.SimulatorContext.ConnectionString
member.summary: The connection string used to access the simulator database.

member.summary: The unique id for this body.

The unique id for this body.

member.name: P:StarSimLib.Body.Mass
member.summary: The mass of the .

member.summary: The current position of the in 3D space.

member.summary: The current velocity of the in 3D space.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Body.GetForceBetween(StarSimLib.Body,StarSimLib.Body)
member.summary: Gets the force vector for the attraction between A and B.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Body.DistanceTo(StarSimLib.Body,StarSimLib.Vector3d@)
member.summary: Finds and returns the distance between the current instance and the given . In other words, it finds the magnitude of the translation vector between the two instances.
member.param: The other instance to which to calculate the distance.
The vector showing the displacement of the current body from the given one.
member.returns: The distance to the other as a .

member.name: M:StarSimLib.Body.Update(StarSimLib.Vector3d,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the of the current body using the given force vector and time step.
member.param: The sum vector of all forces due to other s.

member.name: T:StarSimLib.OrbitGenerator
member.summary: Initialises positions, velocities, and orbits for bodies.

member.name: F:StarSimLib.OrbitGenerator.Rng
member.summary: Random number generator.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.OrbitGenerator.RandomOrbit(StarSimLib.Vector3d)
member.summary: Returns a randomised orbit around a central, heavy mass.
member.param: The position vector for the body for which to generate the orbit.
member.returns: The magnitude of the velocity of the orbit.

member.name: M:StarSimLib.OrbitGenerator.RandomPosition
member.summary: Returns a random position within the universe sphere (see ).
